This section describes the different AT commands use cases with details on the prerequisites, sequence of operation and expected output.

Note: The EVB is shipped with pre-loaded AT application firmware. If there is a need to reinstall the firmware or install a higher version of the firmware, follow the instructions provided in section: Download the Necessary Packages of the AT Commands Quick Start Guide:
